storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The initial situation
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: Family members or just the future hero are introduced with their names and situations.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The absence of a character or characters (the absent guardian(s)) is created
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: Parents or elders leave home because of: work, travel, business, war, death or another reason.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: An interdiction or injunction is given
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero gets a warning not to do something or a request to do something.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: An interdiction is violated or an injunction fulfilled
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero ignores a warning or request that has been given to him.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: An attempt to obtain information is made
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The villain spies or asks questions about the object or person he wants to get,

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: Information is delivered
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The villain gets the information he wants.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The villain attempts to deceive or coerce the victim
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The villain puts on a disguise and plays a nasty trick on the hero or victim.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The victim submits to deception or coercion
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero falls for the villain's trick and helps the villain.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The villain creates a misfortune or crisis
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The villain steals an object, kidnaps a victim, or puts a spell on a victim.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: Something is lacking or desired
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero or someone else needs or wants something.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The misfortune or shortage is made known to the hero
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero learns of the villainy, need or want from a call for help, a request, a command, a threat, or news.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The seeker hero agrees to or decides upon counteraction
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero decides or agrees to go on a journey to search for it and bring it.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero leaves home
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero leaves on a journey.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The donor presents a test to the hero
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero meets a magical person or animal and is tested for kindness, sympathy, willingness to help, or another test.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero reacts to the donor
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero answers the test.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero receives the magical agent
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero is rewarded with magical things.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero arrives at the whereabouts of the object of search.
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero arrives at his destination by magic, guidance, or normally.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: A struggle begins between the hero and the villain
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero and villain have a competition of cleverness or fighting.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero is branded or marked
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero is wounded, leaving a special mark on the hero.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The villain is defeated
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The villain is defeated.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The misfortune or lack is liquidated
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero gets back the stolen object, the kidnapped victim is rescued, or the villain's spell is broken.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero sets out to return
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero returns home or escapes from the villain.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: A pursuit of the hero begins
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero is chased by the villain.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero is rescued from or escapes pursuit
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero escapes from the chase by hiding, placing obstacles, or another way.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero, unrecognised, arrives home or in another domain
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero arrives home but people don't know who he is or believe he's a hero.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: A difficult task is proposed to the hero
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero is given a difficult task or competition: to survive an ordeal, to guess a riddle, to choose correctly, other.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero accomplishes a difficult task
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero succeeds at a difficult task or competition.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero is recognised
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero is recognised as who he is or is appreciated as a hero.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The false hero or villain is exposed
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The villain is found out: people find out he is a villain.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero is given a new appearance
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero is given a new rank, a new appearance, or new clothes.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The false hero or villain is punished
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The villain is punished.

storymaps.Function_-Memento.description: The hero is rewarded
storymaps.Function_-Memento.friendly__description: The hero is rewarded.
